March 4th, I960
Mr. Harold Hill,
NAEB,
14 Gregor Hall,
Urbana, Ill.
Dear Mr. Hill:
Would you please indicate on a slip of paper
my earnings for 1959* This will assist me with
Canadian Income Tax matters
Would you please Indicate, at the same time, the amount
of my first cheque from the NAEB—that would be for Sept.
I believe I commenced on the 7th of that month. Thank you.
• y
96 St. Joseph St
Toronto 5, Ont.,
Canada.
